verses.verse: These are the journeys <WH4550> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, which went forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with their armies <WH6635> under the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>.

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> their goings out <WH4161> according to their journeys <WH4550> by the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>: and these are their journeys <WH4550> according to their goings out <WH4161>.

And they departed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, on the fifteenth <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>; on the morrow <WH4283> after the passover <WH6453> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went out <WH3318> with an high <WH7311> hand <WH3027> in the sight <WH5869> of all the Egyptians <WH4714>.

For the Egyptians <WH4714> buried <WH6912> all their firstborn <WH1060>, which the Lord <WH3068> had struck <WH5221> among them <WH430>: upon their gods also the Lord <WH3068> executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8201>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> removed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486>, and pitched <WH2583> in Succoth <WH5523>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Succoth <WH5523>, and pitched <WH2583> in Etham <WH864>, which is in the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Etham <WH864>, and turned again <WH7725> unto Pi <WH6367>–hahiroth, which is before Baal <WH1189>–zephon: and they pitched <WH2583> before <WH6440> Migdol <WH4024>.

And they departed <WH5265> from before <WH6440> Pi <WH6367>–hahiroth, and passed through <WH5674> the middle <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> into the wilderness <WH4057>, and went <WH3212> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Etham <WH864>, and pitched <WH2583> in Marah <WH4785>.

And they removed <WH5265> from Marah <WH4785>, and came <WH935> unto Elim <WH362>: and in Elim <WH362> were twelve <WH8147> fountains <WH5869> of water <WH4325>, and sixty and ten <WH7657> palm trees <WH8558>; and they pitched there <WH2583>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Elim <WH362>, and encamped <WH2583> by the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.
And they removed <WH5265> from the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, and encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>.
And they took their journey <WH5265> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>, and encamped <WH2583> in Dophkah <WH1850>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Dophkah <WH1850>, and encamped <WH2583> in Alush <WH442>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Alush <WH442>, and encamped <WH2583> at Rephidim <WH7508>, where was no water <WH4325> for the people <WH5971> to drink <WH8354>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Rephidim <WH7508>, and pitched <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.
And they removed <WH5265> from the desert <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, and pitched <WH2583> at Kibroth <WH6914>–hattaavah.
And they departed <WH5265> from Kibroth <WH6914>–hattaavah, and encamped <WH2583> at Hazeroth <WH2698>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Hazeroth <WH2698>, and pitched <WH2583> in Rithmah <WH7575>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Rithmah <WH7575>, and pitched <WH2583> at Rimmon <WH7428>–parez.
And they departed <WH5265> from Rimmon <WH7428>–parez, and pitched <WH2583> in Libnah <WH3841>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Libnah <WH3841>, and pitched <WH2583> at Rissah <WH7446>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rissah <WH7446>, and pitched <WH2583> in Kehelathah <WH6954>.
And they went <WH5265> from Kehelathah <WH6954>, and pitched <WH2583> in mountain <WH2022> Shapher <WH8234>.
And they removed <WH5265> from mountain <WH2022> Shapher <WH8234>, and encamped <WH2583> in Haradah <WH2732>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Haradah <WH2732>, and pitched <WH2583> in Makheloth <WH4722>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Makheloth <WH4722>, and encamped <WH2583> at Tahath <WH8480>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Tahath <WH8480>, and pitched <WH2583> at Tarah <WH8646>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Tarah <WH8646>, and pitched <WH2583> in Mithcah <WH4989>.
And they went <WH5265> from Mithcah <WH4989>, and pitched <WH2583> in Hashmonah <WH2832>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Hashmonah <WH2832>, and encamped <WH2583> at Moseroth <WH4149>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Moseroth <WH4149>, and pitched <WH2583> in Bene <WH1142>–jaakan.
And they removed <WH5265> from Bene <WH1142>–jaakan, and encamped <WH2583> at Hor <WH2735>–hagidgad.
And they went <WH5265> from Hor <WH2735>–hagidgad, and pitched <WH2583> in Jotbathah <WH3193>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Jotbathah <WH3193>, and encamped <WH2583> at Ebronah <WH5684>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Ebronah <WH5684>, and encamped <WH2583> at Ezion <WH6100>–gaber.
And they removed <WH5265> from Ezion <WH6100>–gaber, and pitched <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790>, which is Kadesh <WH6946>.
And they removed <WH5265> from Kadesh <WH6946>, and pitched <WH2583> in mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, in the edge <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>.

And Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> went up <WH5927> into mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> at the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068>, and died <WH4191> there <WH705>, in the fortieth year <WH8141> after the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the first <WH259> day of the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320>.
And Aaron <WH175> was an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died <WH4194> in mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>.

And king <WH4428> Arad <WH6166> the Canaanite <WH3669>, which lived <WH3427> in the south <WH5045> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, heard <WH8085> of the coming <WH935> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And they departed <WH5265> from mountain <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, and pitched <WH2583> in Zalmonah <WH6758>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Zalmonah <WH6758>, and pitched <WH2583> in Punon <WH6325>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Punon <WH6325>, and pitched <WH2583> in Oboth <WH88>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Oboth <WH88>, and pitched <WH2583> in Ije <WH5863>–abarim, in the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>.
And they departed <WH5265> from Iim <WH5864>, and pitched <WH2583> in Dibon <WH1769>–gad.
And they removed <WH5265> from Dibon <WH1769>–gad, and encamped <WH2583> in Almon <WH5963>–diblathaim.
And they removed <WH5265> from Almon <WH5963>–diblathaim, and pitched <WH2583> in the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim <WH5682>, before <WH6440> Nebo <WH5015>.
And they departed <WH5265> from the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim <WH5682>, and pitched <WH2583> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho <WH3405>.
And they pitched <WH2583> by Jordan <WH3383>, from Beth <WH1020>–jesimoth even unto Abel <WH63>–shittim in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH5674>, When you are passed over Jordan <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>;

Then you shall drive out <WH3423> all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you <WH6>, and destroy all their pictures <WH4906>, and destroy <WH6> all their molten <WH4541> images <WH6754>, and quite pluck down <WH8045> all their high places <WH1116>:
And you shall dispossess <WH3423> the inhabitants of the land <WH776>, and live <WH3427> in it <WH5414>: for I have given you the land <WH776> to possess it <WH3423>.

And you shall divide <WH5157> the land <WH776> by lot <WH1486> for an inheritance <WH5157> among your families <WH4940>: and to the more <WH7227> you shall give the more <WH7235> inheritance <WH5159>, and to the fewer <WH4592> you shall give the less <WH4591> inheritance <WH5159>: every man <WH1486>'s inheritance shall be in the place where his lot falls <WH3318>; according to the tribes <WH4294> of your fathers <WH1> you shall inherit <WH5157>.

But if you will not drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you <WH3498>; then it shall come to pass, that those which you let remain of them shall be pricks <WH7899> in your eyes <WH5869>, and thorns <WH6796> in your sides <WH6654>, and shall vex <WH6887> you in the land <WH776> where you live <WH3427>.
Moreover it shall come to pass <WH6213>, that I shall do unto you <WH1819>, as I thought to do unto them <WH6213>.
